short_summary: Information on available office space for lease in Fredericton, New Brunswick
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police is seeking information on the availability of office space for lease in the Fredericton, New Brunswick area.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Leased Office Space in the Fredericton area

### Solicitation Number
*X7051-2024-1*

### Publication and Closing Dates
*Posted on: 2024-02-23*
*Closes on: 2024-03-22*

### Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to lease office space in the Fredericton area. The solicitation aims to gather information regarding the availability and feasibility of office spaces that meet their requirements.

### Solicitation Information
* **UNSPSC Code**: 80131500 (Lease and rental of property or building)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: New Brunswick

### Contact Information
- **Melanie Lewell**
- **Ar Leasing**
- **Email:** AR_Leasing@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** (902) 220-8701
- **Address:** 80 Garland Avenue, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia B3B 0A7, Canada

### Documents
- [English Version](*Request for Information: X7051-2024-1*): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32564/request-for-information-x7051-2024-01-en.pdf>
- [French Version](*Demande de Renseignements: X7051-2024-1): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32564/request-for-information-x7051-2024-01-fr.pdf>

### Solicitation Status
This solicitation is currently **closed** due to a **passed close date**. 

# Notice:
The solicitation documents and attached files are properties of the Government of Canada and may only be used for authorized purposes. This notice does not commit the Government of Canada to sign any contract. No payment will be made until a contract is awarded and signed. Note that information contained in this publication is subject to change and its accuracy cannot be guaranteed without direct verification from the contracting officer. 

**THE GOVERNMENT OF CANADA IS SUBJECT ONLY TO THE LAWS OF CANADA.**
